name: Piercing through the Darkness
description:
Piercing through the Darkness: an interactive fiction about the quest of a man to kill off his chronic pain.

To get the best experience of playing Piercing through the Darkness, 

  • please wear a headset 
  • and have the volume turn on.

Please click on the hyperlink-text (in blue font) to play.

An Interactive Fiction (created in Twine) by Colin Justin Wan for ProjectSuperimpostion.
